**Publications**:

## 2019

### Measuring color using image analysis

**Summary**: 
Promote the usage of image analysis as well as development of statistical methodologies for that purpose.

**Publications**:

1. [Longitudinal concordance correlation function based on variance components: an application in fruit color analysis (2018)](https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007%2Fs13253-018-0321-1)
